DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject 18 75 year age time screen 2 . A clinical diagnosis type 1 2 diabetes determine Investigator , minimum 12 month duration : Criteria type 1 diabetes : Required : Age onset < 40 year age Required : History insulin use management diabetes Required : history normal weight underweight time diagnosis . Not require : Initial presentation diabetic ketoacidosis . Not require : History diabetic ketoacidosis Not require : Low fast Cpeptide Criteria type 2 diabetes : Required : Age onset ~ 40 year age Required : History initial oral antidiabetic use Required : History overweight time diagnosis . Type 2 insulin require define type 2 diabetes subject take insulin without oral antidiabetic agent may also include : incretin mimetic , pramlintide GLP agonist Type 2 noninsulin require define type 2 diabetes subject take oral medication may also include : incretin mimetic , pramlintide GLP agonist 3 . Adequate venous access assess investigator appropriate staff 1 . Subject unable tolerate tape adhesive area sensor placement . 2 . Subject history myocardial infarction , unstable angina , coronary artery bypass surgery , coronary artery stenting , transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) , cerebrovascular accident ( CVA ) , angina , congestive heart failure , ventricular rhythm disturbance thromboembolic disease 10 .
